short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the new Silver and Platinum badges on Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are the new Silver and Platinum badges cluttering up your Reddit experience? Averse to change? Stuck to your old ways?

Never fear, with Reddit Silver/Platinum Hider, all of the money that people have spent on Silver and Platinum will be completely wasted!

View the source code here (it's extremely simple!): https://github.com/brandonsturgeon/reddit-silver-platinum-hider
